item.title: Street light not working on Herbert Road Se18 3qe, 2nd January
item.description:
Street light outside 137 Herbert Road SE18 3QE not working for 4 days. It has been fixed many times but keeps breaking down again.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Herbert Road, Woolwich

item.title: Blocked drain / flooding, 2nd January
item.description:
I observed a roadside drain/gully overflowing early this morning on Canning Street near Denmark Hill station. Water was spilling onto the road surface and appeared to be at risk of causing localised flooding. This was near a restaurant and residential area. Please could this be inspected and cleared as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Canning Cross, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned private Bicycle padlocked to sign., 2nd January
item.description:
This padlocked bicycle has clearly been abandoned and constitutes fly tip as the back wheel is missing and the bicycle has been vandalised. This was not the right place to ' Park ' a bicycle in the first instance. It is an eyesore and needs removal please.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Casterbridge Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed vehicle with no MOT, 1st January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eardley Road, Lessness Heath, Greater London
